ui.question: Otázka
ui.good_desc: Víš toho hodně o Bella Sara!

horseDatas.name: Abenaki
horseDatas.quote: Respect yourself first. Then others will honor your strength.

horseDatas.name: Absaroke
horseDatas.quote: Dancing keeps you in touch with your body and its energy.

horseDatas.name: Achilles
horseDatas.quote: Have the courage to learn from your weaknesses and grow stronger.

horseDatas.name: Addis
horseDatas.quote: Když se ti někdo omluví, odpusť mu.

horseDatas.name: Aegis
horseDatas.quote: Do something that makes you feel proud. Others will be proud of you too.

horseDatas.name: Aheron
horseDatas.quote: Listen to those who encourage you, and encourage those who listen.

horseDatas.name: Akama
horseDatas.quote: What you do today creates your future.

horseDatas.name: Aleut
horseDatas.quote: Give your imagination time, and it will find a way.

horseDatas.name: Alexander
horseDatas.quote: Make your own choices, and let others make theirs.

horseDatas.name: Alibi
horseDatas.quote: Find new ways to be with others.

horseDatas.name: Alina
horseDatas.quote: Your good character is the most precious thing you own.

horseDatas.name: Amia
horseDatas.quote: Your heart is my heart. Our friendship is forever.

horseDatas.name: Amor
horseDatas.quote: Svou láskou přines do světa mír.

horseDatas.name: Anemone
horseDatas.quote: Měj své srdce otevřené. Věř v dávání a přijímání lásky.

horseDatas.name: Angel
horseDatas.quote: Angel přichází. Udělej jí místo a nech nebesa, ať ti pomohou.

horseDatas.name: Anigan
horseDatas.quote: Na tomto okamžiku najdi něco, co tě rozesměje.

horseDatas.name: Anisinabe
horseDatas.quote: Let your dreams inspire you and lead you to an answer.

horseDatas.name: Anouk
horseDatas.quote: Share your feelings. That's how you become free and happy.

horseDatas.name: Anthea
horseDatas.quote: Svého cíle nemusíš dosáhnout dnes. Stačí se posunout o krok dál.

horseDatas.name: Apache
horseDatas.quote: Find joy in being with others. Use it to spin your own web of delight.

horseDatas.name: Aphaia
horseDatas.quote: Dare to loosen your grip for a while. You will see things differently.

horseDatas.name: Aphrodite
horseDatas.quote: Hledej krásu tam, kde bys ji nejméně očekávala.

horseDatas.name: Apollo
horseDatas.quote: Spousta malých kroků ti splní velké sny.

horseDatas.name: Apuni
horseDatas.quote: Dream soaring dreams and wake ready to fly.

horseDatas.name: Ara
horseDatas.quote: You have the power to forget anger and get along again.

horseDatas.name: Arapaho
horseDatas.quote: Show you are responsible by always telling the truth.

horseDatas.name: Arelus
horseDatas.quote: A happy memory can bring you joy right now.

horseDatas.name: Ariadne
horseDatas.quote: You are surrounded by loving, caring people.

horseDatas.name: Aries
horseDatas.quote: Show your strength and pace with dignity.

horseDatas.name: Arim
horseDatas.quote: Your friendships are strong and loving.

horseDatas.name: Artemis
horseDatas.quote: I will help you have courage and pride.

horseDatas.name: Aster
horseDatas.quote: Show your passion. It will shine through everything you do.

horseDatas.name: Asteria
horseDatas.quote: Share your thoughts and feelings in writing.

horseDatas.name: Atalaya
horseDatas.quote: Use kind words when you talk about yourself.

horseDatas.name: Athena
horseDatas.quote: Buď svá, buď volná a dej stejnou svobodu i ostatním.

horseDatas.name: Aurora
horseDatas.quote: Energie přírody je vždy a všude kolem tebe.

horseDatas.name: Autumn
horseDatas.quote: Finishing what you started gives you energy.

horseDatas.name: Aviva
horseDatas.quote: Read a good book. Let it inspire you to write a story of your own.

horseDatas.name: Azuro
horseDatas.quote: Know that you are loved for who you really are.

horseDatas.name: Balto
horseDatas.quote: appiness is a decision. Decide to be happy.

horseDatas.name: Bandi
horseDatas.quote: Express yourself freely. If you need help, ask for it.

horseDatas.name: Barleycorn
horseDatas.quote: Your way can be different without being better or worse than others.

horseDatas.name: Bathylas
horseDatas.quote: When you try something new, you learn and grow.

horseDatas.name: Beau
horseDatas.quote: Choose to do what you feel is right.

horseDatas.name: Beauty
horseDatas.quote: Bring one of your friends and come play with me.

horseDatas.name: Bella
horseDatas.quote: Každý den mysli pozitivně! Ucítíš radost a energii, kterou Ti toto myšlení přinese.

horseDatas.name: Bellerophon
horseDatas.quote: A real hero needs a loving heart.

horseDatas.name: Bellisimo
horseDatas.quote: Důvěřuj si a budeš vědět, jak žít.

horseDatas.name: Bellissa
horseDatas.quote: Staň se tím, kým chceš být. Cestou hledej a rozdávej radost.

horseDatas.name: Bello
horseDatas.quote: Život je dar. Přijmi ho a měj ho ráda.

horseDatas.name: Beran
horseDatas.quote: Můžeš se rozhodnout, že tě tento okamžik změní.

horseDatas.name: Bifrost
horseDatas.quote: Where love is there are always miracles.

horseDatas.name: Birdy
horseDatas.quote: Make peace with yourself and your friends.

horseDatas.name: Blackfeet
horseDatas.quote: Take courage and leap! Your timing is perfect.

horseDatas.name: Blackie
horseDatas.quote: Follow your dreams. Feel the happiness it brings.

horseDatas.name: Bliss
horseDatas.quote: I am out looking for adventure. Come and join me.

horseDatas.name: Blossom
horseDatas.quote: Close your eyes and imagine your wildest dream.

horseDatas.name: Bluebell
horseDatas.quote: Naše přátelství nás činí volnými a silnějšími.

horseDatas.name: Bonnie
horseDatas.quote: When you do something wrong, learn from it and forgive yourself.

horseDatas.name: Boreas
horseDatas.quote: Přijmi výzvu. Staneš se silnější a odvážnější, než jsi byla doposud.

horseDatas.name: Bosi
horseDatas.quote: Use all your abilities to make this a beautiful place.

horseDatas.name: Briar
horseDatas.quote: Believing in yourself makes things go better for you.

horseDatas.name: Brigid
horseDatas.quote: Be the kind of person the world needs.

horseDatas.name: Brine
horseDatas.quote: Choose friends who are positive and loving.

horseDatas.name: Brioso
horseDatas.quote: You are full of life and energy. Use it to do something great!

horseDatas.name: Brisi
horseDatas.quote: Let's celebrate — come dance with me!

horseDatas.name: Brumby
horseDatas.quote: Let go and enjoy the ride!

horseDatas.name: Bryda
horseDatas.quote: True love means caring for someone else like you care for yourself.

horseDatas.name: Bukefalos
horseDatas.quote: Life is not about anger. It is about peace.

horseDatas.name: Butterfly
horseDatas.quote: Make time to relax, be silent and enjoy the peace and quiet.

horseDatas.name: Cajus
horseDatas.quote: The world's happiness comes from having happy thoughts.

horseDatas.name: Calato
horseDatas.quote: Believe in what you do and be successful.

horseDatas.name: Calyx
horseDatas.quote: We can climb mountains together.

horseDatas.name: Camelot
horseDatas.quote: Don't run for desires that are impossible to complete.

horseDatas.name: Cantaro
horseDatas.quote: Develop your ability to lead. Ask a wise person for advice.

horseDatas.name: Cara
horseDatas.quote: All friendships begin with a smile and a kind word.

horseDatas.name: Carmina
horseDatas.quote: Real friends can always tell each other the truth.

horseDatas.name: Cascadeur
horseDatas.quote: The things you have lost will come back by themselves.

horseDatas.name: Cate
horseDatas.quote: The power of love can help you do what you need to do.

horseDatas.name: Celesta
horseDatas.quote: Look at the sky. See the art that nature creates.

horseDatas.name: Ceranna
horseDatas.quote: Be the first to smile at someone new.

horseDatas.name: Ceratos
horseDatas.quote: You live in a world of amazing abundance. Believe it!

horseDatas.name: Ceres
horseDatas.quote: When you feed your spirit, things around you will grow.

horseDatas.name: Cha Ye
horseDatas.quote: Smart people got that way by asking questions.

horseDatas.name: Charlemagne
horseDatas.quote: Pay attention to the lessons life teaches you.

horseDatas.name: Charlie
horseDatas.quote: Make time to listen to your friends.

horseDatas.name: Cherub
horseDatas.quote: Hope is the magic that turns wishes into goals.

horseDatas.name: Cheyenne
horseDatas.quote: See the beauty in both the shadow and the light.

horseDatas.name: Chiricahua
horseDatas.quote: Open your arms to someone who is trying to be your loyal friend.

horseDatas.name: Chitimacha
horseDatas.quote: Fly far and explore, but remember the way home.

horseDatas.name: Chitra
horseDatas.quote: Always choose the path that allows you to do your best for yourself and others.

horseDatas.name: Chromasia
horseDatas.quote: The sweet sound of your voice makes me smile.

horseDatas.name: Chryso
horseDatas.quote: Daring to try is a success in itself.

horseDatas.name: Chumash
horseDatas.quote: Uvolni se a směj se. Budeš světem šířit radost.

horseDatas.name: Chung
horseDatas.quote: Let go of pain and sorrow. The road will open and everything will go right.

horseDatas.name: Cindra
horseDatas.quote: Nech naději pozvednout Tvé myšlenky.

horseDatas.name: Cioccola
horseDatas.quote: You can do it! Make your dreams come true!

horseDatas.name: Cirra
horseDatas.quote: See the beauty inside your friends.

horseDatas.name: Clio
horseDatas.quote: Let your ideas flow. They are meant to be used.

horseDatas.name: Cochiti
horseDatas.quote: Look at the positive side of what you are doing and have fun.

horseDatas.name: Coco
horseDatas.quote: Come let us play and have some fun and joy.

horseDatas.name: Colour
horseDatas.quote: Vnímej radost v tom, co vidíš, slyšíš a cítíš.

horseDatas.name: Comanche
horseDatas.quote: Harmony comes from a peaceful mind, an open heart, and a forgiving nature.

horseDatas.name: Conall
horseDatas.quote: Feel the courage inside you.

horseDatas.name: Connora
horseDatas.quote: Spend time with a friend. Do something you both enjoy.

horseDatas.name: Cookie
horseDatas.quote: I make it easy for you to find yourself.

horseDatas.name: Coral
horseDatas.quote: Někdy přijde pomoc z nejméně očekávaného místa.

horseDatas.name: Corcel
horseDatas.quote: Choose a worthy goal and go after it with all your heart.

horseDatas.name: Cordelia
horseDatas.quote: Create happy events by seeking joy in every moment.

horseDatas.name: Cosima
horseDatas.quote: Learning is the key that opens up the whole world to you.

horseDatas.name: Cupid
horseDatas.quote: Your heart is free. Have the courage to follow it.

horseDatas.name: Cybele
horseDatas.quote: Believe in the abundance of love that surrounds you.

horseDatas.name: Daisy
horseDatas.quote: Remember to express what you feel and need.

horseDatas.name: Dane
horseDatas.quote: Life is beautiful in so many ways. Open your eyes to them all.

horseDatas.name: Danu
horseDatas.quote: Life is full of surprises. Enjoy it!

horseDatas.name: Dart
horseDatas.quote: You have the power to change things for the better.

horseDatas.name: Dawn
horseDatas.quote: Your natural charm is delightful.

horseDatas.name: Daybreak
horseDatas.quote: Ask your family about themselves. You will learn where you come from.

horseDatas.name: Delight
horseDatas.quote: Being kind to someone makes both of you feel good.

horseDatas.name: Demeter
horseDatas.quote: Take care of yourself and others. Feel the joy it brings you.

horseDatas.name: Dewdrop
horseDatas.quote: Give yourself time to rest. You can do more later.

horseDatas.name: Dewsparkle
horseDatas.quote: Give yourself time to rest. You can do more later.

horseDatas.name: Diablo
horseDatas.quote: Where anger is there is love. Where sorrow is there is joy.

horseDatas.name: Diamond
horseDatas.quote: Důvěřuj mi. Jsem tady, abych ti pomohl stát se milující a dobrou kamarádkou.

horseDatas.name: Diana
horseDatas.quote: Take care of nature. Let the world stay a beautiful place to live.

horseDatas.name: Dina
horseDatas.quote: Do something you like and enjoy it.

horseDatas.name: Dino
horseDatas.quote: Look for the peace behind power and energy.

horseDatas.name: Dixie
horseDatas.quote: With joint effort we can make changes.

horseDatas.name: Djengis
horseDatas.quote: Let your inner strength break free.

horseDatas.name: Dodo
horseDatas.quote: Every day is a gift appreciate it.

horseDatas.name: Domino
horseDatas.quote: Do something with joy and you will feel contented.

horseDatas.name: Donn
horseDatas.quote: Share your good feelings and they will come back to you.

horseDatas.name: Donna
horseDatas.quote: Allow others to give you loving care.

horseDatas.name: Donnecha
horseDatas.quote: This moment is full of chances for you to grow and learn.

horseDatas.name: Dowager
horseDatas.quote: Your kindness is as beautiful as a garden full of flowers.

horseDatas.name: Dreamer
horseDatas.quote: Let your dream show you the way.

horseDatas.name: Dreki
horseDatas.quote: More listening and less talking can make things better.

horseDatas.name: Dusk
horseDatas.quote: Learning helps you choose wisely and trust your choices.

horseDatas.name: Dusty
horseDatas.quote: Find the fun in what people find funny in you.

horseDatas.name: Dynamo
horseDatas.quote: Believe in yourself. Have confidence in what you do.

horseDatas.name: Dyni
horseDatas.quote: Find something to do that makes you happy.

horseDatas.name: Eagle
horseDatas.quote: Dívej se na svět shora jako orel.

horseDatas.name: Ebenos
horseDatas.quote: Today is another chance to do something wonderful.

horseDatas.name: Echo
horseDatas.quote: Tell others what is important to you.

horseDatas.name: Edana
horseDatas.quote: Začni svůj den šťastnou myšlenkou.

horseDatas.name: Edda
horseDatas.quote: You don't have to be perfect. Do your best and you will be just right.

horseDatas.name: Eirene
horseDatas.quote: Every moment is a new chance for you to make things better.

horseDatas.name: Embarr
horseDatas.quote: Listen to the music of my heart.

horseDatas.name: Emberic
horseDatas.quote: Ve svém životě můžeš vytvářet zázraky. Věř tomu!

horseDatas.name: Empress
horseDatas.quote: Tvůj duch je silný a ušlechtilý. Nos jej jako korunu slávy.

horseDatas.name: Epona
horseDatas.quote: Thank you for being honest with me and with yourself.

horseDatas.name: Erinn
horseDatas.quote: Know yourself and you will know others.

horseDatas.name: Euros
horseDatas.quote: Look for the truth in unexpected places.

horseDatas.name: Eurynome
horseDatas.quote: Everything is easier when you focus on what you're doing.

horseDatas.name: Excelsior
horseDatas.quote: Every new journey begins with the first step.

horseDatas.name: Fairybell
horseDatas.quote: Look for friends who make you feel good.

horseDatas.name: Faith
horseDatas.quote: Have faith that the world is full of love to give you.

horseDatas.name: Falcha
horseDatas.quote: It's okay for things to change. Say yes to the future.

horseDatas.name: Farah
horseDatas.quote: Begin your story with a dream that inspires you.

horseDatas.name: Farfalla
horseDatas.quote: You can fly! Just close your eyes and use your imagination.

horseDatas.name: Faris
horseDatas.quote: Let your imagination take you to amazing places.

horseDatas.name: Faxon
horseDatas.quote: Learn more about your family. You will feel closer to them.

horseDatas.name: Felise
horseDatas.quote: When you feel pain, listen to what it is trying to tell you.

horseDatas.name: Feng
horseDatas.quote: This moment is full of opportunities.

horseDatas.name: Filippa
horseDatas.quote: Enjoy what you have got. You don't need what you have not.

horseDatas.name: Fiona
horseDatas.quote: Buď hrdinkou svého vlastního příběhu.

horseDatas.name: Firebright
horseDatas.quote: Let others see the fire that burns so brightly in your heart.

horseDatas.name: Firewalker
horseDatas.quote: Belief gives you the courage to move forward and take chances.

horseDatas.name: Flame
horseDatas.quote: Běžím rychleji než vítr. Pojď se mnou a najdeme kouzelné místo.

horseDatas.name: Flipper
horseDatas.quote: Moje objetí ti přinese energii a kouzla. Poté se už nemusíš bát.

horseDatas.name: Flora
horseDatas.quote: Otevři se jako květina a ukaž svou vnitřní krásu.

horseDatas.name: Flower
horseDatas.quote: Be good to someone. Make it a way of being.

horseDatas.name: Fox
horseDatas.quote: Feel the freedom and the silence around you.

horseDatas.name: Freja
horseDatas.quote: Close your eyes and hear the sound around you.

horseDatas.name: Friends
horseDatas.quote: Think of all the good that exists in your friendships.

horseDatas.name: Friends Forever
horseDatas.quote: Believe in the goodness between you and other people.

horseDatas.name: Froya
horseDatas.quote: Život je kouzelný. Obejmi ho.

horseDatas.name: Fylgie
horseDatas.quote: Open your arms to all that is good.

horseDatas.name: Gaia
horseDatas.quote: The world is a magical place. Enjoy it!

horseDatas.name: Geisha
horseDatas.quote: Be generous and give away with love.

horseDatas.name: Generosity
horseDatas.quote: Find love by making someone else's day brighter.

horseDatas.name: Ghost
horseDatas.quote: Your beauty comes from within.

horseDatas.name: Giasa
horseDatas.quote: Trust your feelings. They will tell you what to do.

horseDatas.name: Gracie
horseDatas.quote: Opravdový přítel je jedním z nejcennějších pokladů.

horseDatas.name: Graia
horseDatas.quote: Spread your wings and be free.

horseDatas.name: Greenlock
horseDatas.quote: Only you know what is right for you.

horseDatas.name: Grey
horseDatas.quote: If you really want it, it will come to you.

horseDatas.name: Hai Sheng
horseDatas.quote: Tell the truth, but do it with love.

horseDatas.name: Haku
horseDatas.quote: Listen for the hidden harmony beneath the roar.

horseDatas.name: Halloween
horseDatas.quote: I will keep you safe.

horseDatas.name: Harmony
horseDatas.quote: Making music creates harmony in the world.

horseDatas.name: Hecate
horseDatas.quote: You are perfect just as you are!

horseDatas.name: Helia
horseDatas.quote: Když budeme dělat věci společně, naše přátelství poroste.

horseDatas.name: Hellevi
horseDatas.quote: Learn about the past. It will help you see the future.

horseDatas.name: Hera
horseDatas.quote: Be the leader in your own life.

horseDatas.name: Hercules
horseDatas.quote: Don't be afraid to ask for help.

horseDatas.name: Hestia
horseDatas.quote: When you share, everyone feels happy.

horseDatas.name: Hidatsa
horseDatas.quote: You will always have more chances!

horseDatas.name: Hilario
horseDatas.quote: Playing around with something new is a fun way to learn.

horseDatas.name: Honey
horseDatas.quote: Create something beautiful. It will make you feel peaceful.

horseDatas.name: Honora
horseDatas.quote: Važ si svých silných stránek a užívej je ke konání dobra.

horseDatas.name: Honu
horseDatas.quote: Protect the beauty of nature.

horseDatas.name: Hummingbird
horseDatas.quote: Jdi za smyslem života.

horseDatas.name: Hunter
horseDatas.quote: Do something you didn't know you could. Take the chances that come.

horseDatas.name: Huron
horseDatas.quote: You can encourage others to learn and grow.

horseDatas.name: Icehorn
horseDatas.quote: Open your heart to all sorts of wonderful dreams!

horseDatas.name: Iceprince
horseDatas.quote: Let others see who you really are.

horseDatas.name: Iduna
horseDatas.quote: Feel the beauty inside you and let it blossom

horseDatas.name: Inuit
horseDatas.quote: Find your own unique voice and let your feelings sing out.

horseDatas.name: Inupiat
horseDatas.quote: Máš sílu a odhodlání čelit jakékoli výzvě.

horseDatas.name: Isleta
horseDatas.quote: Every day brings new chances. Watch for the right moment.

horseDatas.name: Icarus
horseDatas.quote: Choose to be with people who care about you.

horseDatas.name: Iceking
horseDatas.quote: Naděje je jako kouzlo. Díky ní jsi plná energie.

horseDatas.name: Iris
horseDatas.quote: Follow the rainbow. Believe in happiness.

horseDatas.name: Isak
horseDatas.quote: Be open, flexible, and quick.

horseDatas.name: Ivy
horseDatas.quote: Wish only for what you really want.

horseDatas.name: Jaida
horseDatas.quote: Take good care of yourself. Be healthy and happy.

horseDatas.name: Jajali
horseDatas.quote: When you laugh your troubles get smaller.

horseDatas.name: Janie
horseDatas.quote: Uč se ze včerejška, raduj se z dnešního dne a mysli na zítřek.

horseDatas.name: Janus
horseDatas.quote: Do the best you can!

horseDatas.name: Jewel
horseDatas.quote: Pomohu Ti zůstat ve stálém přílivu hojnosti.

horseDatas.name: Jicarilla
horseDatas.quote: You can climb huge mountains if you choose your path wisely.

horseDatas.name: Jojo
horseDatas.quote: You create your own reality.

horseDatas.name: Joker
horseDatas.quote: Be aware of all the beauty around you.

horseDatas.name: Jolly
horseDatas.quote: Slunce svítí na Tebe a na mě. Pojďme si hrát s hudbou!

horseDatas.name: Jonas
horseDatas.quote: Live out your dreams every day. This day will never come again.

horseDatas.name: Jonathan
horseDatas.quote: It is time for joyful playing. Joy creates miracles.

horseDatas.name: Joy
horseDatas.quote: Let us try different adventures together as a way to grow and learn.

horseDatas.name: Juno
horseDatas.quote: You can choose to be joyful and celebrate!

horseDatas.name: Jupiter
horseDatas.quote: Be willing to forgive.

horseDatas.name: Kahuna
horseDatas.quote: A generous spirit finds friends everywhere.

horseDatas.name: Kallista
horseDatas.quote: You are in this world to make it better.

horseDatas.name: Karna
horseDatas.quote: I am your friend, both when your in your joy and your sadness.

horseDatas.name: Keetoowah
horseDatas.quote: Everyone does better when we take care of each other.

horseDatas.name: Kelpie-Pooka
horseDatas.quote: Believe in the goodness of life.

horseDatas.name: Kendra
horseDatas.quote: Change is a part of life. Learn to enjoy it.

horseDatas.name: Khrysor
horseDatas.quote: Life is full of chances. Anything could happen.

horseDatas.name: Kiki
horseDatas.quote: Let me tell you a fairy tale. Listen and use your imagination.

horseDatas.name: King
horseDatas.quote: I will help you spread peace and unity throughout the world.

horseDatas.name: Kini
horseDatas.quote: Don't be afraid to show your feelings.

horseDatas.name: Kio
horseDatas.quote: Your strength comes from within.

horseDatas.name: Kiowa
horseDatas.quote: Be patient! You will get what you need when you need it most.

horseDatas.name: Kira
horseDatas.quote: You can only appreciate happiness if you have felt sadness.

horseDatas.name: Kitty
horseDatas.quote: Když budeš šťastná, budou šťastní i tvoji přátelé.

horseDatas.name: Knight
horseDatas.quote: The best path from here to there is not always a straight line.

horseDatas.name: Komenos
horseDatas.quote: Enjoy every minute playing with your friends.

horseDatas.name: Kona
horseDatas.quote: Podívej se do svého nitra a najdi svoji vnitřní sílu.

horseDatas.name: Konfu
horseDatas.quote: Move towards your goals. The road is open.

horseDatas.name: Kora
horseDatas.quote: Jsem hrdá na to, že mohu být Tvou kamarádkou.

horseDatas.name: Kounari
horseDatas.quote: When someone does something nice for you, enjoy it!

horseDatas.name: Laguna
horseDatas.quote: With an open, loving heart, you can taste the joy in life.

horseDatas.name: Lakehorse
horseDatas.quote: Share what you know with others. It will make you stronger.

horseDatas.name: Lakota
horseDatas.quote: Sdílej bohatství života se všemi lidmi a zvířaty na planetě.

horseDatas.name: Lancelot
horseDatas.quote: Be patient. Wait for the right moment before you take action.

horseDatas.name: Larena
horseDatas.quote: You are ready to spread your wings and fly!

horseDatas.name: Lenape
horseDatas.quote: Don't push others to change. Love them as they are.

horseDatas.name: Leonard
horseDatas.quote: Your life is a sundance.

horseDatas.name: Leonardo
horseDatas.quote: When you hear me neigh you will feel the joy we have.

horseDatas.name: Lien
horseDatas.quote: Nejdůležitější období Tvého života nastává právě teď.

horseDatas.name: Lillova
